name: Shepherd (nerdError, serafimkvashnin)
description:
You can run, you can pickup weapons, you can fight with evil monsters and explode red barrels, of course!

A submission for Miz Jam 1.

We actually spent about 16 hours working on the game without a break on the last day! Please rate, this is our first jam and also first time on Godot, so, yeah, it was fun..
